summary: A documentary exploring Manu Prakash's journey through curiosity-driven science and his impactful innovations.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man with curly hair and a beard, wearing a brown jacket over a light blue shirt, sitting against a plain background. He appears to be speaking, as indicated by his hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene transitions to a blackboard-like background with the text 'BACKGROUND TO BREAKTHROUGH' in bold white letters, suggesting a thematic shift to an educational or informative segment. The video then returns to the man, now in black and white, with the text 'MANU PRAKASH' displayed prominently on the screen, identifying him as the subject of the video. The man continues to speak, maintaining a thoughtful demeanor. The video concludes with the man still seated, with the text 'DR MANU PRAKASH' appearing on the screen, further emphasizing his identity and possibly his professional title. The overall atmosphere is one of a formal interview or presentation, with a focus on the man's insights and expertise.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker contemplating his life's purpose, questioning "why am I a scientist." He then introduces himself as Manu Prakash, an associate professor in bioengineering at Stanford University. Light, inquisitive music plays softly in the background, creating a thoughtful mood.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with curly hair and a beard, wearing a brown jacket over a light blue shirt, seated against a plain white background. He appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as indicated by his expressive hand gestures and facial expressions. The man's attire and the simplicity of the background suggest a casual yet professional setting. Throughout the video, the man's gestures and expressions convey a sense of engagement and emphasis on his points. The text "DR MANU PRAKASH" appears on the screen, identifying the man as Dr. Manu Prakash. The video maintains a consistent visual style, with the man's movements and expressions being the primary focus against the unchanging backdrop.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with one male speaker talking about introducing science to people "in a context" and mentions someone is "always grading you". He reflects on how his own introduction to science was so informal, that he "didn't even know that was science". All speech is delivered in a contemplative tone. The soundscape is completed by calm, unobtrusive ambient music in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a map of India, highlighting the country's borders and states in a greenish hue against a light background. The map is accompanied by an illustration of a grand building, possibly a palace or temple, set against an orange circle, with the word "INDIA" written below it. The scene transitions to a man with curly hair, wearing a brown jacket over a light blue shirt and jeans, sitting against a plain background. He appears to be speaking, gesturing with his hands. The video then shifts to an illustration of a knife with intricate patterns on its blade and handle, labeled "Rampuri Chaku" in red text, indicating the type of knife being discussed. The final scene shows the knife disassembled into its components, with the blade and handle separated, set against a red grid background, emphasizing the knife's structure and design.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker reminiscing about his childhood in a small town called Rampur. He mentions a knife called Rampuri Chaku, unique to that region, which sparked his early fascination with manufacturing. The speech is calm and nostalgic.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a stylized illustration of a broken knife on a red grid background, followed by a scene of a laboratory with shelves of scientific equipment and a cracked wall illuminated by a light bulb. A person with curly hair and a beard, wearing a brown jacket and a blue shirt, appears against a plain background, speaking and gesturing. The scene transitions to a circular frame showing a silhouette of a person pointing towards a landscape with a cow and a fence, set against a yellow and blue background. The video then returns to the person speaking, followed by an illustration of a hand reaching for a roll of tape on a dotted surface. The narrative continues with a stylized depiction of a burning ship and oil rig, with flames and smoke rising against a yellow sun. The video concludes with an illustration of a red test tube on a stand, with a small pile of red particles at its base, set against a blue background. Throughout the video, the illustrations and the person's speech create a cohesive narrative that blends scientific imagery with storytelling.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker describing a childhood memory of an abandoned lab that was in the house where he lived. He speaks with a tone of nostalgia, describing the lab's mysterious atmosphere. He and his brother would play with sophisticated scientific instruments. He remembers building his first microscope using his brotherâ€™s eye glasses. The audio clip ends with him mentioning his brother's reaction to his stolen eyeglasses.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with an animated depiction of a modern building complex, featuring geometric shapes and vibrant colors, with two individuals walking towards the entrance. The scene transitions to a person with curly hair, wearing a brown jacket and blue shirt, seated against a plain background, gesturing as if explaining something. The narrative then shifts to an animated illustration of a person surrounded by stacks of books, writing at a desk with a quill pen, emphasizing a studious atmosphere. The video continues with the same person, now in a contemplative pose, surrounded by books, highlighting a theme of intellectual pursuit. The final scene returns to the animated depiction of the building complex, with the two individuals now standing near the entrance, suggesting a connection between the study and the architectural setting. Throughout the video, the consistent use of animation and illustration creates a cohesive visual narrative that blends real-life elements with imaginative depictions.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features a male speaker recounting his experience in high school in India, noting the intense competition for exams required to enter good engineering or medical schools. He emphasizes the exams' focus on books rather than practical experience, describing a stark contrast to his personality and spending 16 hours a day preparing, conveying a tone of reflection. He reveals that memories of his childhood days gradually resurfaced as his way of surviving.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with curly hair and a beard, dressed in a brown jacket over a light blue shirt, seated against a plain white background. He appears to be engaged in a conversation, using hand gestures to emphasize his points. The scene transitions to a series of animated graphics, starting with a red circle containing a white rocket ship, followed by a red and white abstract design resembling a stylized eye. The animation continues with a red circle featuring a white figure in a dynamic pose, surrounded by a cracked texture. The video then returns to the man, who continues to speak and gesture, maintaining the same attire and background. The overall atmosphere is casual and conversational, with the animated graphics adding a creative and artistic element to the video.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker reflecting on the importance of "open-ended creativity and curiosity" in his lab work. He speaks in a thoughtful tone about his preference for the "mundane" in science, believing that uncovering puzzles in the ordinary reveals deeper understanding. This is followed by a brief, ambient sound of liquid splashing, then music. The music is soft and ambient, creating a gentle mood, with strings being the dominant instrument.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a stylized illustration of a magnifying glass focusing on a pair of eyes, set against a red background with intricate patterns. The scene transitions to a close-up of a magnified view of a single cell, showcasing its internal structure with a red and white color scheme. The next frame presents a magnified view of a different cell, this time with a yellow and white color scheme, emphasizing its internal details. The video then shifts to a series of frames depicting clusters of cells, each with distinct color schemes and patterns, illustrating the diversity of cellular structures. The final frames display a collection of cells in various colors and arrangements, with the text "COMPLEX MULTICELLULAR LIFE" prominently displayed, indicating the theme of the video. The background remains consistent with a beige color, providing a neutral backdrop for the vibrant cellular illustrations. The video effectively conveys the complexity and diversity of cellular life through its visual representations and textual elements.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with speech from a single male speaker with a measured, academic tone. He discusses lab studies and how cells become organisms, focusing on the evolution of multicellular life and the complexity of differentiation. Following this, the clip ends.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a title card displaying the words "COMPLEX MULTICELLULAR LIFE" in bold, white letters against a dark green background, with a stylized illustration of a cell or organism in the center. The scene then transitions to a man with curly hair and a beard, wearing a brown jacket over a light blue shirt, sitting against a plain white background. He appears to be engaged in a conversation, as indicated by his hand gestures and facial expressions. The man's attire and the simple background suggest a casual yet professional setting. Throughout the video, the man maintains a relaxed posture, occasionally shifting his gaze and adjusting his position slightly, indicating an ongoing dialogue or interview. The consistent background and the man's attire remain unchanged, emphasizing the focus on his expressions and gestures. The video concludes with the man still seated, his hands clasped together, and his gaze directed slightly to the side, suggesting a moment of contemplation or reflection within the conversation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features a male speaker reflecting on the privilege of curiosity in science and the responsibility to share opportunities. He speaks in a thoughtful tone, explaining how he dedicates a significant portion of his time to this cause. He then mentions a "funny story" before fading into what seems to be background music of an ambient nature, carrying a pensive mood, and an electronic beat.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with curly hair and a beard, dressed in a brown jacket over a light blue shirt and green pants, seated against a plain white background. He is engaged in a conversation, using expressive hand gestures to emphasize his points. The man's facial expressions and body language suggest he is deeply involved in the discussion, occasionally looking to his left and right, possibly addressing someone off-camera or referring to visual aids. The video transitions to an animated sequence with a red border, displaying a series of illustrations and graphs related to mosquitoes, including a mosquito silhouette, a sound wave pattern, and a grid with a blue square, indicating a focus on mosquito behavior or detection. The animation then returns to the man, who continues his discussion with animated hand movements, maintaining the same attire and background. The video concludes with the man still speaking, his gestures and expressions conveying a sense of engagement and emphasis on the topic at hand.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker discussing his lab at Stanford, mentioning construction delays and traveling with students to Thailand and India, driven by the question of what inspires them. He mentions visiting labs across Thailand, observing mosquito surveillance, noting that mosquitoes are the deadliest organism, and that there is a lack of tools to monitor them. He begins talking about acoustics, and explains that mosquitoes buzz is a unique signature, and that cell phones are capable of recording sound and geolocation, leading to a new product. He asserts that even a cheap flip phone can contribute.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with an animated sequence featuring a hand holding a flip phone displaying a sound wave, surrounded by abstract shapes and patterns. The scene transitions to a man with curly hair, wearing a brown jacket and blue shirt, sitting against a plain background, gesturing as he speaks. The narrative continues with the man in various poses, emphasizing his points with hand movements. An animated globe appears, followed by a stack of coins with the words 'Cost' and 'Access' indicating a discussion on financial aspects. The video then shifts to a black-and-white scene of the man handling a camera, suggesting a focus on technology or photography. The man is seen adjusting the camera, highlighting its features, and eventually wearing it as a makeshift headgear, indicating a creative or experimental approach. The video concludes with the man continuing to speak, maintaining the same plain background, tying the narrative together with a consistent visual theme.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker discussing how floods in Puerto Rico can affect mosquito distribution and the need for societal participation in finding solutions, using a thoughtful and inquisitive tone. He transitions to sharing a personal experience from India, observing a pristine microscope operated by only one person. He contrasts the inaccessibility of expensive microscopes with the invention of Foldscope, an origami-based microscope assembled by hand, describing it with a hopeful, determined tone. He concludes by mentioning a simple goal of making the world more curious through these tools, maintaining a calm and optimistic tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with curly hair and a beard, dressed in a brown jacket and a light blue shirt, seated against a plain white background. He appears to be engaged in a conversation, using hand gestures to emphasize his points. The scene transitions to an animated sequence depicting a person crouching in a narrow alleyway between buildings, rendered in a stylized, geometric art style with bold colors. The animation then zooms in on a close-up of an ant on a cracked surface, highlighting the intricate details of the ant's body and the surrounding textures. The video returns to the man, who continues to speak, maintaining a thoughtful expression. Throughout the video, the man's gestures and expressions suggest he is explaining or discussing a topic, possibly related to the visual elements shown in the animation. The overall atmosphere is calm and focused, with a minimalist aesthetic that draws attention to the subject and the visual narrative.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker describing a video he saw of a child in Delhi explaining what something means to him, specifically referencing the joy of "picking up an ant and understanding what it means." He emphasizes that the audio in full scope videos is often captured, allowing listeners to hear a person thinking. The clip ends with a brief outburst of excited children.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a group of people gathered around a table, engaged in an activity involving a smartphone. The individuals are focused on the device, with one person holding it and others leaning in to observe. The table is cluttered with various items, including a black water bottle, a smartphone, and a plastic bag containing small objects. The scene then transitions to a close-up of two individuals, one wearing a red and white beanie, holding a white object up to their eyes, possibly a pair of glasses or a device. The next scene features a man with curly hair, wearing a brown jacket and a light blue shirt, sitting against a plain white background. He appears to be speaking, gesturing with his hands, and occasionally looking to the side, suggesting he is engaged in a conversation or interview. The video maintains a consistent focus on the man, capturing his expressions and gestures as he continues to speak, with his hands clasped together and his body language indicating a relaxed and conversational tone. The plain white background remains unchanged throughout, emphasizing the man's presence and the ongoing dialogue.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with children laughing in a playful manner. This fades as a man begins speaking, recounting an experience showing his work to a famous academic scientist. He reflects on his initial hesitation, contrasting his "paper microscopes" with the other's world-saving sequencing technologies. He notes that after showing his work, the scientist smiled and shared his sense of wonder, which put the speaker at ease.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with curly hair and a beard, dressed in a brown jacket over a light blue shirt, seated against a plain white background. He appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as indicated by his hand gestures and facial expressions. The man's demeanor is relaxed and conversational, with his hands occasionally clasped together or gesturing as he speaks. The setting is simple and uncluttered, focusing attention on the speaker. The video concludes with a black screen displaying text in white, acknowledging the support of the National Institute of General Medical Sciences under Grant No. R25GM116704. The disclaimer clarifies that the opinions expressed are solely those of the speaker and do not necessarily represent the views of iBiology, the National Science Foundation, the National Institutes of Health, or other funders.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker with a thoughtful tone, discussing learning a life lesson about pursuing passions and giving your best effort now rather than waiting. He emphasizes the importance of listening to oneself to achieve dreams. He then states that listening to oneself is essential to being a good scientist. Gentle, reflective piano music plays softly in the background throughout the speech, creating a calm, contemplative mood.
